document_data.caption: A flask of aqua regia.
document_data.name: Aqua regia
document_data.mainbody: '''Aqua regia''', otherwise known as '''royal water''', was a type of highly corrosive acid in the Realms that was prized by [[alchemist]]s and chemists.{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|22}}
document_data.Properties: This substance was orange in color. The acid was extremely dangerous to touch or consume,
document_data.Crafting: Aqua regia could be created by distilling [[aqua fortis]] and [[sal ammoniac]] with [[nitre]].

Usages.Spell Components:
* ''[[Bone blight]]'' used a drop of aqua regia. 
* ''[[Lesser ironguard]]'' and ''[[tenfold ironguard]]'' used a handful of iron filings and a drop of aqua regia. 
* ''[[Vitriolic sphere]]'' could use aqua regia.

document_data.Trivia: Aqua regia could be poured from an ''[[alchemy jug]]''.
